TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServicePoint extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供 HTTP 连接的连接管理。

span.span: Provides connection management for HTTP connections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类根据在资源的统一资源标识符（URI）中传递的主机信息来处理与 Internet 资源的连接。The class handles connections to an Internet resource based on the host information passed in the resource's Uniform Resource Identifier (URI). 与资源的初始连接将确定 对象维护的信息，该信息随后由对该资源的所有后续请求共享。The initial connection to the resource determines the information that the object maintains, which is then shared by all subsequent requests to that resource. 对象由 类管理，并根据需要由 方法创建。 objects are managed by the class and are created, if necessary, by the method. 不会直接创建 对象，但始终由 类创建和管理。 objects are never created directly but are always created and managed by the class. 可以创建的最大 对象数由 属性设置。The maximum number of objects that can be created is set by the property. 每个 对象保持与 Internet 资源的连接，直到其空闲时间超过 属性中指定的时间。Each object maintains its connection to an Internet resource until it has been idle longer than the time specified in the property. 当 超出 值时，可以将其回收到其他连接。When a exceeds the value, it can be recycled to another connection. 的默认值由 属性设置。The default value of is set by the property. 如果将 属性设置为-1 以外的值，并且在指定的时间过后，则会在服务下一个请求后关闭活动的 连接。When the property is set to a value other than -1, and after the specified time elapses, an active connection is closed after it services the next request. 这对于不需要无限期打开的活动连接的应用程序非常有用，因为这些应用程序默认为。This is useful for applications that do not require active connections that are opened indefinitely, as they are by default. > [!NOTE] > 在高负载情况下，某些应用程序可能会耗尽 ThreadPool 中的可用线程，这可能导致系统性能不佳（如高和可变事务时间）。In high load conditions, some applications may run out of free threads in the ThreadPool, which may lead to poor system performance (such as high and variable transaction times). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个连接到 URI `www.contoso.com`的 对象。The following code example creates a object that connects to the URI `www.contoso.com`. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些负载平衡技术要求客户端使用特定的本地 IP 地址和端口号，而不是 （或 Internet 协议版本6）和临时端口。Some load balancing techniques require a client to use a specific local IP address and port number, rather than (or for Internet Protocol Version 6) and an ephemeral port. 可以满足此要求。Your can satisfy this requirement.

Public Function CloseConnectionGroup (connectionGroupName As String) As Boolean

param.name: connectionGroupName
param.span: 连接组的名称，该连接组包含要关闭的和要从此服务点移除的连接。

span.span: The name of the connection group that contains the connections to close and remove from this service point.

summary.span: 从此 对象移除指定的连接组。

span.span: Removes the specified connection group from this object.

returns.span: 指示连接组是否关闭的 值。

span.span: A value that indicates whether the connection group was closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 连接组将一组请求与特定连接或连接集相关联。Connection groups associate a set of requests with a particular connection or set of connections. 此方法删除并关闭属于指定连接组的所有连接。This method removes and closes all connections that belong to the specified connection group.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置在多少毫秒之后关闭活动 连接。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of milliseconds after which an active connection is closed.

value.span: ，它指定活动 连接保持打开的毫秒数。

span.span: A that specifies the number of milliseconds that an active connection remains open.

value.span: 默认值为 -1，这样活动 连接可以无限期保持连接。

span.span: The default is -1, which allows an active connection to stay connected indefinitely.

value.span: 将此属性设置为 0 可在 连接为请求提供服务之后强制关闭该连接。

span.span: Set this property to 0 to force connections to close after servicing a request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性来确保 对象的活动连接不会无限期地保持打开状态。You can use this property to ensure that a object's active connections do not remain open indefinitely. 此属性适用于应定期删除和重新建立连接的情况，例如负载平衡方案。This property is intended for scenarios where connections should be dropped and reestablished periodically, such as load balancing scenarios. 默认情况下，当为请求 `true` 时， 属性设置由于不活动而关闭 连接的超时时间。By default, when is `true` for a request, the property sets the time-out for closing connections due to inactivity. 如果 具有活动的连接，则 不起作用，连接将无限期地保持打开状态。If the has active connections, has no effect and the connections remain open indefinitely. 如果将 属性设置为-1 以外的值，并在指定的时间过后，则在处理请求后将关闭活动 连接，方法是将 设置为该请求中的 `false`。When the property is set to a value other than -1, and after the specified time elapses, an active connection is closed after servicing a request by setting to `false` in that request. 设置此值将影响 对象管理的所有连接。Setting this value affects all connections managed by the object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置此属性的值。The following code example sets the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLServicePoint#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLServicePoint/CPP/nclservicepoint.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCLServicePoint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLServicePoint/CS/nclservicepoint.cs#1)] [!code-vb[NCLServicePoint#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLServicePoint/VB/nclservicepoint.vb#1)]

exception.span: 为 Set 操作指定的值为小于 -1 的负数。

span.span: The value specified for a set operation is a negative number less than -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 对象是通过调用带有 参数的 重载构造的，则 属性表示所使用的 对象的 属性。If the object was constructed by calling a overload with a argument, then the property represents the property of the object used. 如果 对象是从网络主机和端口构造的，则 属性包含表示主机和网络端口的字符串。If the object was constructed from a network host and port, the property contains a string that represents the host and the network port. 如果 属性是从主机和端口构造的，则只有具有相同 值 对象才能使用此 对象。If the property is set when constructed from a host and port, only objects with the same value can use this object. ## Examples [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Expect100Continue { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Expect100Continue : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 值，该值确定是否使用 100-Continue 行为。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether 100-Continue behavior is used.

value.span: 如果 请求需要 100-Continue 响应，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to expect 100-Continue responses for requests; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为 `true`，则使用 `POST` 方法的客户端请求将从服务器接收 100-Continue 响应，以指示客户端应发送要发送的数据。When this property is set to `true`, client requests that use the `POST` method expect to receive a 100-Continue response from the server to indicate that the client should send the data to be posted. 当基于请求标头的服务器要拒绝请求时，此机制可让客户端避免在网络上发送大量的数据。This mechanism allows clients to avoid sending large amounts of data over the network when the server, based on the request headers, intends to reject the request. 例如，假设 属性为 `false`。For example, assume the property is `false`. 将请求发送到服务器时，它将包含数据。When the request is sent to the server, it includes the data. 如果在读取请求标头后，服务器需要身份验证并发送401响应，则客户端必须使用正确的身份验证标头重新发送数据。If, after reading the request headers, the server requires authentication and sends a 401 response, the client must resend the data with proper authentication headers. 如果 `true` 属性，则请求标头将发送到服务器。If the property is `true`, the request headers are sent to the server. 如果服务器未拒绝请求，则会发送一个 100-Continue 响应，该响应将发送数据。If the server has not rejected the request, it sends a 100-Continue response signaling that the data can be transmitted. 如前面的示例中所示，服务器需要身份验证，发送401响应，客户端不会不必要地传输数据。If, as in the preceding example, the server requires authentication, it sends the 401 response and the client has not unnecessarily transmitted the data. 更改此属性的值不会影响现有连接。Changing the value of this property does not affect existing connections. 只会影响在更改后创建的新连接。Only new connections created after the change are affected. IETF RFC 2616 部分10.1.1 中完全介绍了预期 100-Continue 行为。The Expect 100-Continue behavior is fully described in IETF RFC 2616 Section 10.1.1. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示此属性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性记录服务点从主机断开连接的最后日期和时间。The property records the last date and time at which a service point was disconnected from a host. 当当前时间与 之差超过 的值时， 对象可以回收到另一个连接。When the difference between the current time and exceeds the value of , the object is available for recycling to another connection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 属性来设置和检索 对象上次连接到主机的日期和时间。The following code example uses the property to set and retrieve the date and time that the object was last connected to a host. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxIdleTime { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxIdleTime : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置与 对象关联的连接在关闭前可以持续空闲的时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of time a connection associated with the object can remain idle before the connection is closed.

value.span: 与 对象关联的连接在关闭和重用于另一个连接前可以持续空闲的时间长度（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: The length of time, in milliseconds, that a connection associated with the object can remain idle before it is closed and reused for another connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以将 设置为 ，以指示与 对象关联的连接应永远不会超时。You can set to to indicate that a connection associated with the object should never time out. 当创建 对象时， 属性的默认值是 属性的值。The default value of the property is the value of the property when the object is created. 对 属性的后续更改不会影响现有的 对象。Subsequent changes to the property have no effect on existing objects. 当超过与 关联的连接的 时，连接将保持打开状态，直到应用程序尝试使用该连接。When the for a connection associated with a is exceeded, the connection remains open until the application tries to use the connection. 此时，框架会关闭连接并创建与远程主机的新连接。At that time, the Framework closes the connection and creates a new connection to the remote host. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 属性来设置和检索 空闲时间。The following code example uses the property to set and retrieve the idle time. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetTcpKeepAlive (bool enabled, int keepAliveTime, int keepAliveInterval);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetTcpKeepAlive(bool enabled, int32 keepAliveTime, int32 keepAliveInterval) cil managed
Public Sub SetTcpKeepAlive (enabled As Boolean, keepAliveTime As Integer, keepAliveInterval As Integer)
public: void SetTcpKeepAlive(bool enabled, int keepAliveTime, int keepAliveInterval);
member this.SetTcpKeepAlive : bool * int * int -> unit

param.name: enabled
param.span: 如果设置为 true，则将使用指定的 和 值启用 TCP 连接上的 TCP keep-alive 选项。

span.span: If set to true, then the TCP keep-alive option on a TCP connection will be enabled using the specified and values.

param.span: 如果设置为 false，则将禁用 TCP keep-alive 选项，并忽略剩余参数。

span.span: If set to false, then the TCP keep-alive option is disabled and the remaining parameters are ignored.
The default value is false.

param.name: keepAliveTime
param.span: 指定发送第一个 keep-alive 数据包之前没有活动的超时时间（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: Specifies the timeout, in milliseconds, with no activity until the first keep-alive packet is sent.
The value must be greater than 0.

param.span: 如果传递的值小于或等于零，则会引发 。

span.span: If a value of less than or equal to zero is passed an is thrown.

param.name: keepAliveInterval
param.span: 指定当未收到确认消息时发送连续 keep-alive 数据包之间的间隔（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: Specifies the interval, in milliseconds, between when successive keep-alive packets are sent if no acknowledgement is received.
The value must be greater than 0.

param.span: 如果传递的值小于或等于零，则会引发 。

span.span: If a value of less than or equal to zero is passed an is thrown.

summary.span: 对 TCP 连接启用或禁用 keep-alive 选项。

span.span: Enables or disables the keep-alive option on a TCP connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以请求 TCP/IP 提供程序允许在 TCP 连接上使用 keep-alive 数据包。An application can request that a TCP/IP provider enable the use of keep-alive packets on a TCP connection. 默认情况下，禁用 TCP 连接上的 keep-alive 数据包。The default is that the use of keep-alive packets on a TCP connection is disabled. 初始化 TCP 套接字时，默认设置会将 keep-alive 超时设置为2小时，将 keep-alive 间隔设置为1秒。The default settings when a TCP socket is initialized sets the keep-alive timeout to 2 hours and the keep-alive interval to 1 second. `keepAliveTime` 参数指定在发送第一个 keep-alive 数据包之前没有活动的超时值（以毫秒为单位）。The `keepAliveTime` parameter specifies the timeout, in milliseconds, with no activity until the first keep-alive packet is sent. `keepAliveInterval` 参数指定当未收到确认消息时发送连续 keep-alive 数据包之间的间隔（以毫秒为单位）。The `keepAliveInterval` parameter specifies the interval, in milliseconds, between when successive keep-alive packets are sent if no acknowledgement is received. 不能更改 keep-alive 探测的数目，并将其设置为10。The number of keep-alive probes cannot be changed and is set to 10. 如果 TCP 连接作为 keep-alive 的结果被删除，则会将 返回到套接字上正在进行的任何调用，并且任何后续调用都将失败并返回 的 。If a TCP connection is dropped as the result of keep-alives, a of is returned to any calls in progress on the socket, and any subsequent calls will fail with a of .

exception.span: 为 或 参数指定的值小于等于 0.

span.span: The value specified for or parameter is less than or equal to 0.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SupportsPipelining As Boolean
public: property bool SupportsPipelining { bool get(); };

summary.span: 指示 对象是否支持管道连接。

span.span: Indicates whether the object supports pipelined connections.

value.span: 如果 对象支持管道连接，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the object supports pipelined connections; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 流水线功能使客户端可以跨持久性连接发送多个请求，而无需等待来自服务器的每个响应。Pipelining allows clients to send multiple requests across a persistent connection without waiting for each response from the server. 服务器按照收到请求的顺序来发送响应。The server sends the responses in the same order as the requests were received. IETF RFC 2616 部分8.1.2.2 中详细介绍了管道。Pipelining is described in detail in IETF RFC 2616 section 8.1.2.2. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示此属性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseNagleAlgorithm { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 值，该值确定在此 对象所管理的连接上是否使用 Nagle 算法。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the Nagle algorithm is used on connections managed by this object.

value.span: 如果使用 Nagle 算法，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to use the Nagle algorithm; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Nagle 算法用于缓冲少量的数据，并将其作为单个数据包传输。The Nagle algorithm is used to buffer small packets of data and transmit them as a single packet. 此过程（称为 "nagling"）广泛使用，因为它减少了传输的数据包数量并降低了每个数据包的开销。This process, referred to as "nagling," is widely used because it reduces the number of packets transmitted and lowers the overhead per packet. 更改此属性的值不会影响现有连接。Changing the value of this property does not affect existing connections. 只会影响在更改后创建的新连接。Only new connections created after the change are affected. 在 IETF RFC 896 中，已完全介绍了 Nagle 算法。The Nagle algorithm is fully described in IETF RFC 896. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示此属性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[System.Net.ServicePoint#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CPP/servicepoint.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.ServicePoint#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/CS/servicepoint.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Net.ServicePoint#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.ServicePoint/VB/servicepoint.vb#9)]
